data.title: Dinner
data.text: Great burgers and meat patties are thick. The fries are thick cut. Good place to watch a game since they have numerous tv screens.

data.title: New customer
data.text:
First time customer here.  Arrived right after lunch time today, Saturday.  The place was packed.  Got the last parking space in the parking lot.

Ordered a hamburger with curly fries, both delicious. What amazed me was the Coke which was a fountain type drink, not a can or a bottle. It has excellent flavor.

The restaurant is just a half block off 4th Avenue. Busy but worth the wait. I only gave a 4 rating because service was slow but most likely because they were so busy.

data.title: Good solid burger
data.text: good hamburger with a very good spread of extras(ie: onions, salsa, etc..) service fair, beer is cold as are the sodas and tea.

data.title: It's an "All the Way" experience
data.text: This is heaven for burger lovers. Almost everything on the menu was a burger! The fix'ns com on a platter and they're good too. It is as the name says ...and it's expensive too.

data.title: Great Breakfast, yes they have breakfast
data.text: Just had breakfast there with the grandkids and food and service were great.  Enough TV's to entertain each of us and a TV at our booth was really nice.  Three of us had breakfast (Chorizo) was tasty.  One grandson had fish and chips and even though it was breakfast time they didn't have a problem fixing it for him.  Will be back and maybe try it later in the day.

data.title: Good Food Good service.
data.text: Good place to eat. good service, good food. they get busy so you lunch from start to finish will be about 45 minutes.

data.title: Best spot in Yuma!
data.text:
This place is amazing! They have a traditional and very experimental menu with plenty of hometown favorites. You can try something new and really enjoy yourself by sampling different things on the menu.
Johnny behind the bar is a fantastic soul and is worth interacting with.
When we ordered waters, they never got below halfway and were instantly refilled. The servers Pay good close attention to the customers and take very good care of you.

data.title: Unique
data.text:
Great selection of beers. Service has always been very good. Hamburgers', Mexican food, and more.
One of my favorites is the shrimp hamburger.

data.title: Expensive for what you get
data.text: The food was alright but over priced, the staff were friendly and the atmosphere was OK. We did not get great value for our money especially with the exchange.

data.title: went with friends for burgers and beer
data.text: Food is excellent.  I really like the pickled carrot that come with your burgers. The place was very busy but we didn't have to wait very long for a table.

data.title: Do you like burgers and sports?
data.text: Looking for burgers? Try the rajita burger, fries and cheese dip are always a good choice. I like the fish tacos.

data.title: Best Burgers in Yuma!
data.text: Burgers & Beer have some of the best burgers in Yuma, especially the mushroom burger.  Outstanding quality and the service is excellent!!

data.title: Awesome burgers. Great atmoshphere.  And do you like sports?  This is the place for you.
data.text:
When you first walk in, you will first notice the aroma.  Make no mistake about it, these guys know their beef.  And when you see the menu, you will realize that this establishment will not let you go home hungry.

The portions are generous, and they provide enough condiments to sink a battleship.  You can create your ultimate burger, and it will be cooked exactly as you requested.

data.title: Waitng to be wowwed!
data.text:
Having not been to Yuma for a number of years, we hoped to return and check out some of our favorite restaurants that we so fondly remembered. 
We remembered the old Burgers and beer.  A dimly lit honky tonk , decorated with t-shirts hanging from the ceiling, with whimsical phrases.  
Starting out my wife and I both ordered a draft beer.  We were both startled when they arrived, as the glass was huge.  Too much for a one beer guy!  My fault.
Our burgers arrived in a somewhat timely manner, and our meal continued from there.
Our meal was good, and our service was good as well. 
But this modern day Burgers and Beer has turned into the same old franchise burger joint that is found on every other corner.  
When traveling out for dinner, we are in search of atmosphere, along with friendliness of  the staff.  As well as great food.

data.title: Great burgers- but go for BREAKFAST!
data.text: Of course Burgers and Beer is great for lunch and dinner. But try them for breakfast. It's becoming a tradition for me now. Their breakfast menu is good, and nothing has disappointed me yet on it. The chilaquiles is my favorite!

data.title: A top pick in Yuma
data.text: This restaurant has a fun, vibrant atmosphere. There are quite a few TV's with different games on, so, in that sense, it's sort of a sports bar. We like to sit on the large, covered patio. There is a lot of fried food, Mexican food, and, of course, burgers on the menu. And a large bar. I haven't tried anything I didn't like!

data.title: Loud local hang out!
data.text: First off, this restaurant was a little hard to find. It was extremely busy but we were seated outside. The waitress was very slow upon getting to our table, which we expected due to the number of patrons.  A drink order was placed just before the end of happy hour but was not served for another 10 minutes. Mexican combo plate was very good. The burger I ordered after 3 tries to get it right, I told them to forget it as my husband was done with his meal. A table of male friends became quite loud and were using inappropriate languag. The manager ask them to quiet down and they did somewhat . My burger price was taken off our bill. I probably will not return.

data.title: Excellent place to eat and refresh with a beer!
data.text: Everything I have tried is awesome, and the beer is cold like a blizzard. The appetizer are excellent...

data.title: shrimp burger
data.text: had my first ever shrimp burger here and just have to keep going back for more, typical sports bar but above average food

data.title: The real burger place for Yuma
data.text: If you want a good burger in Yuma you know you can trust Burger and Beer. For years they have been providing excellent burgers and other fare. Also don't forget the individual television set at your table. You can tune in your own game there and ignore all the rest of the sets there. Don' t miss Gary's burger, with an egg on top of the burger! Also the burger with the green  chili on it is great. The only problem is they don't stock Makers Mark, how strange is that?
